name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un brought his own toilet to the summit in Singapore. When he saw the toilet, President Trump said, "Oh, so youâ€™re planning to tweet too?" President Trump told reporters he'll know if the Kim Jong Un meeting is going well by "touch" and "feel." In other words, Trump's lawyer is going to have to pay Kim Jong Un $130,000. There is a Japanese pop band whose members are all over 80 years old. The band is known for their No. 1 hit song, "Where Am I?" President Trump said that during the North Korea summit, he will not focus on human rights abuses. Trump said, "My marriage is no one's business."
